name: Keep The Balls Out
description:
Be a good goalie and keep all them ballz from coming inside!

----How To Play----

Use your mouse to move left and right. Add 10 points for blocking 1 ball. Minus 30 points for letting the opposition score. The higher the points the better! (Max is 590 so screenshot and send me if you can reach it ;) really difficult no joke)

----Credits---- 

Billyman: https://www.youtube.com/c/BillyMan

https://discord.gg/rnFjNg8

Milkshake: https://twitter.com/MilkshakeDev_

----Info---- 

This game was made in 7 days using Game Maker Studio 2, an engine I've never used before. Big thanks to my man Milkshake for providing me with private sessions and teaching me all about the wonderous world of Game Maker!

(hit 500 points and send me a screenshot on discord)
